lead_paragraph: FISHER--Jerome. The Board of Directors and Staff of the American Friends and of The Israel Museum, Jerusalem deeply mourn the passing of our dear friend, Board member, and generous donor, Jerome Fisher. Jerome's commitment to the Museum was exceptional. Together with his wife Anne, Jerome led the Museum's 30th Anniversary Endowment Campaign with a gift naming the Anne and Jerome Fisher Directorship of the Museum. Thereafter, they continued their support in myriad ways at the Museum in Jerusalem and with our American Friends in New York and Palm Beach. He will be missed greatly, and we extend deepest condolences to Anne and the entire family. Stephen Lash and Judy Steinhardt, Board co-chairs, AFIM Stacey Bronfman, President, AFIM James Snyder, Anne & Jerome Fisher Dir, IMJ Leah Siegel, Exec Dir., AFIM 1/3
